text: Georg Albert Ruthenberg (born August 5, 1959), better known by the stage name Pat Smear, is an American musician. He is best known as a rhythm guitarist of the rock band Foo Fighters. He has recorded five studio albums with the band. Smear was a founding member of punk band the Germs. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American singer- songwriters Category:American punk musicians Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Pat Smear
